title: Love, Chai, and Other Four-Letter Words
description: Kiran Mathur knows firsthand just how dangerous love can be. After all, her sister’s marriage in India nearly destroyed Kiran’s family. So she’s decided to redeem romance herself—by not falling for anyone who might disappoint her parents. That is, until she meets her new neighbor Nash Hawthorne...Nash is a dedicated doctor and dedicated to being alone. His family life has taught him abandonment and he isn’t ready for more. But in spending time with Kiran, he starts to believe in a love he’s never felt before. For both, love feels like a risk. But when the future only starts to make sense with each other, it might be time to follow their hearts...
author: Annika Sharma
